QueryText: how to control Bacterial Wilt ?
KCCAns:
Splitting of the tubers at the time of the planting should be avoided as splitting spreads the disease even to health tubers.
Application of stable bleaching powder (12kg/ha) mixed with fertilizer in furrows while planting reduces wilt incidence by 80%.
Practicing crop rotation for 2-3 years with crops like maize, finger millet, cereals, garlic, lupin, and onion cabbage can reduce the disease inoculum.
